Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected suspicious activity on your account. To protect your funds, we need you to verify your identity immediately.

Click the link below to verify your account:
http://bit.ly/bank-verify-urgent

This verification must be completed within 24 hours or your account will be suspended.

Do not reply to this email. If you did not request this verification, please contact our support team immediately.

Best regards,
Bank Security Team
